[!cgo] skip 'test verifies cgo pkg-config errors'
[!exec:pkg-config] skip 'test requires pkg-config tool'

! go list -export .
stderr '^# example\n# '
stderr 'pkg-config'
stderr 'not found|not find'
stderr 'package|Package'

-- go.mod --
module example
go 1.20
-- example.go --
package example

// #cgo pkg-config: libnot-a-valid-cgo-library
import "C"

package main() {}
